docs.snippet: While many soccer fans’ eyes were on Brazil, a group of would-be nation-states met in Sweden last month in the Conifa World Cup, a tournament for teams not recognized by the sport’s governing body....
docs.abstract: While many soccer fans’ eyes were on Brazil, a group of would-be nation-states met in Sweden last month in the Conifa World Cup, a tournament for teams not recognized by the sport’s governing body.

headline.print_headline: A Tournament for the Rest of the World
